Label.Text: What would you like to do today?

Binding.Expression: ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL

Binding.Expression: AND( [Policy Guide Data] == NULL, HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action Prompt") == "Yes", ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0 )

"

Use our dynamic Policy Guide tool to find out what you need to do

"
AND( [Policy Guide Data] <> NULL, //HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action Prompt") == "Yes", ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0 )

IF( $clickid = "plus", [Image Selector] + 1,
$clickid = "minus", [Image Selector] - 1,
[Image Selector] )

Binding.Expression: AND( ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_GET([Settings], "Custom Image URLs")) > 0, HASH_GET([Settings], "Custom Image Visible") == TRUE, [Show Custom Images] == TRUE )
ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0, HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Announcement") = "Always", ARRAY_LENGTH([Announcement Data]) < 1 )
ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0
[LineNumber] < ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Announcement Data]) //hide line for last item

"
"& ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action Data])& ""
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0, HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action") = "Always", ARRAY_LENGTH([Action Data]) < 1 )

"
"& ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action Data])& ""
[LineNumber] < ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Action Data]) //hide line for last item

LET $show:= HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action"); RETURN AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0, ARRAY_LENGTH([Action Data]) > 0, OR( $show = "Always", $show = "Count Dependent") )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0, HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action Summary") = "Yes" )
ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0
AND( [Full Width] <> TRUE, [Icon Size] == 1, [Module Data] <> NULL )
AND( [Full Width] <> TRUE, [Icon Size] == 2, $isMobile <> TRUE, [Module Data] <> NULL )
AND( [Full Width] == TRUE, [Icon Size] == 1, [Module Data] <> NULL )
AND( [Full Width] == TRUE, [Icon Size] == 2, $isMobile <> TRUE, [Module Data] <> NULL )
AND( [Full Width] == TRUE, [Icon Size] == 3, [Module Data] <> NULL )
AND( [Full Width] == TRUE, [Icon Size] == 3, NOT(ISBLANK([Vendor RecordID])) )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Everyone") > 0, HASH_GET([Settings], "Video Tile Visible") == TRUE )
ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0
ARRAY_INDEXOF(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Administrators") > 0

View.BannerHtmlTemplate:
{ LET $logoSize := IF( HASH_GET([Settings], "Logo Size") = 3, "width: 320px; height: 80px;", HASH_GET([Settings], "Logo Size") = 2, "width: 240px; height: 100px;", HASH_GET([Settings], "Logo Size") = 1, "width: 160px; height: 120px;" ); LET $customBannerimage := ""; LET $instanceName := (LET $url := EBMS_GET_BASE_URL(); RETURN RIGHT($url, LEN($url) - FINDR("/", $url))); LET $systemLogo := "
"; LET $logo := IF( HASH_GET([Settings], "Banner Logo URL") <> NULL, $customBannerimage, $systemLogo ); RETURN $logo & $text }
{ LET $text := IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HASH_GET([Settings], "Welcome Text"))), "
" & HASH_GET([Settings], "Welcome Text") & "
" ); RETURN $text }

FieldEntry.Formula: NOW()
HASH_GET( [User to Group Mapping], "Current User" )

IF( $isMobile = TRUE, 2,
ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User Roles"), "Vendor Accounts" ) > 0, 3,
COALESCE( EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Dashboard Icon Size"), HASH_GET([Settings], "Icon Size") ) )

IF( HASH_GET([Settings], "Show Action Summary") = "Yes", ( LET $currentUser := HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Current User"); LET $now := [DateTime of PageLoad];
RETURN HASH( "Actions - Assigned", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Action", "[Responsible - Multiline] IN ROLE " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($currentUser) & " AND ([Status] = 'Ready to Start' OR [Status] = 'In Progress' OR [Status] = 'Overdue')" ))),
"Actions - Overdue", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Action", "[Responsible - Multiline] IN ROLE " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($currentUser) & " AND [Status] = 'Overdue'" ))),
"Actions - Due in 7 days", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Action", "[Responsible - Multiline] IN ROLE " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($currentUser) & " AND [Status] <> 'Complete' AND [Status] <> 'Cancelled' AND [Date Due] > " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(NOW()) ))),
"Meetings - Next 3 days", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Meeting", "[Invitee] IN ROLE " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($currentUser) & " AND [Meeting Date] > " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($now) & " AND [Meeting Date] <= " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(DATEADD("day", 3, $now)) ))) ) ) )
ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_SELECTMANY(EACH [Module Data], $(i, item) $item), $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Name") = "Policy Guide" ))

FormulaCriterion.Formula: HASH_GET($eventargs, "New Tab") <> TRUE
HASH_GET($eventargs, "New Tab") = TRUE
